description technical detail: The perfect compliment for the modern office and developments in corporate desking, the NEC EX231W features an extremely thin LED backlight panel in a design that puts a priority on the screen image and its positioning.For demanding eco users or those wanting the optimum working set up, the EX231W includes luminance and human sensors and the smallest stand on the market that offers full ergonomics. The panel can also easily be moved between VESA mounts.
